Package com.example

Class MatrixGraph

java.lang.Object
com.example.AbstractGraph
com.example.MatrixGraph
All Implemented Interfaces:
Graph
public class MatrixGraph
extends AbstractGraph
A MatrixGraph is an implementation of the Graph abstract class that uses an array to represent the edges.

    • getEdge

      public Edge getEdge​(int source, int dest)
      Get the edge between two vertices. If an edge does not exist, an Edge with a weight of POSITIVE_INFINITY is returned.
      Parameters:
      source - - The source
      dest - - The destination
      Returns:
      the edge between these two vertices
